education.title: About Tuberculosis (TB)
education.what_is_tb: TB is a bacterial infection that mainly affects the lungs but can affect any part of the body.
education.how_spreads: It spreads through air when people with active TB cough, sneeze, or spit.
education.curable: TB is completely curable with proper treatment and medication adherence.
education.next_steps: Early detection and treatment prevent spread to others and serious complications.
